MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Permissions As FolderPermissionCollection

summary.span: 获取或设置的文件夹的权限的列表。

span.span: Gets or sets a list of permissions for the folder.
A collection that includes the list of permissions.

span.para: 时面向 Exchange Online 中，Exchange Online 作为 Office 365 的一部分和开头 Exchange 2013 的 Exchange 内部部署版本中不返回文件夹权限属性集。若要检索文件夹权限，添加属性绑定到文件夹时设置的属性。

When targeting Exchange Online, Exchange Online as part of Office 365, and on-premises versions of Exchange starting with Exchange 2013, folder permissions are not returned in the property set. In order to retrieve folder permissions, add the property to the property set when binding to the folder.

span.para: 呼叫到 Exchange Web Services (EWS) 中调用此方法的结果。
Calling this method results in a call to Exchange Web Services (EWS).

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property WellKnownFolderName As Nullable(Of WellKnownFolderName)

summary.span: 获取一个中列出的公用文件夹名称枚举。

span.span: Gets one of the common folder names listed in the enumeration.

summary.span: 属性是适用于 Exchange Online 和 Exchange Server 2013 开头的 Exchange 版本的目标设定的客户端。

span.span: The property is applicable for clients that target Exchange Online and versions of Exchange starting with Exchange Server 2013.

value.span: 此文件夹的已知文件夹名称枚举值。

span.span: The well-known folder name enumeration value of this folder.
